x

Collab

A collaboration app on Rails. Collab allows users to create free public and paid private collaboration spaces. Differentiated collaborator permissions via Devise and Pundit. Accepts payment via Stripe. All spaces offer markdown rendering.
Built On: Ruby on Rails, Bootstrap, Bcrypt, Figaro, SendGrid, Devise, Pundit, Stripe, RedCarpet, Shoulda, Faker, FactoryGirl, Pry
Date: July 2017
Repository: collab
x

Chateau

A chat app inspired by a mashup of medieval greys and Slack.
Built On: AngularJS + Firebase
Date: February 2017
Repository: chateau
x

Rereadit

A Reddit clone on Rails inspired by the political clout of the original. Rereadit features topics, posts, commenting, favoriting, voting, and email subscription.
Built On: Ruby on Rails, Bootstrap, Bcrypt, Figaro, SendGrid
Date: July 2017
Repository: rereadit
x

Jive Race API

Jive Race API is a customized API built on Node.js, Express, Mongoose, and MongoDB for the Jive Race app. Allows users to register for a race for a given year and create and build teams of runners. Features a custom user authentication and authorization scheme based on project business logic. Deployed to mLab, Heroku.
Built On: Node.js, Express, Mongoose, MongoDB, Heroku, mLab
Date: October 2017
Repository: jive-race-api
x

Jive Race

Jive Race is a full stack race app built on React and the Jive Race API. Allows users to register for a race for a given year and create and build teams of runners. Features a custom user authentication and authorization scheme based on project business logic. Deployed to AWS.
Built On: React, AWS
Date: In Progress
Repository: jive-race
x

Tabletop

Tabletop is a desktop app built on Electron and vanilla Javascript to access the Bloc Educational API. Tabletop offers easy functionality with rainbow-colored good vibes. Students can send messages, submit projects, and view mentor schedules.
Built On: Electron, Node.js, Javascript
Date: July 2017
Repository: tabletop
